wikipedia_page.main: Mark Anthony Waldron Jones (born 22 October 1961) is an English former footballer who played as a full back in the Football League for Aston Villa, Brighton & Hove Albion, Birmingham City, Shrewsbury Town and Hereford United during the 1980s.He played in the 1982 European Super Cup in which Aston Villa defeated Barcelona 3–1 on aggregate.
